data.message: Why don't Facebook develop a way permitting blocking people only on Facebook but kept chatting on messenger?

replies.message: Thanks for the feedback, Abd. We listen to all the feedback we get from the Facebook community. If you have any suggestions, we'd love to hear from you: on.fb.me/1N2bhYs. -Jordan

We don't block Facebook due to the fact of finding loved ones such as your siblings and to communicate with your friends and family members.Also if Anyone in our Community needs help and they don't know what to do or talk to.This goes out to Everyone's children my son's daughter's and her family members Also I love you all.Its to learn more about each and everyone of us hurt and in need.
Miranda Cain call me please.I miss you & 💘 you baby.I was wanting to see how you are doing..
